import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.scss'] }) export class CartComponent { cart=[1,1,1,1] constructor(private router: Router) { } navigateToCheckout() { this.router.navigate(["checkout"]) } }
